overview: HighPerformanceMen.com is proud to present Instigators, a collection of sticky situations and bad seeds getting themselves out of trouble. This volume includes a daddy at a bar teaching a young pup some manners, a voyeur being caught by two studs who don't think he should get a show for free, two wrestlers whose competition gets a little too heated, an employee willing to climb the office ladder by climbing onto some fat dick, and a cocky gym bunny showing he's the alpha in the locker room. Watch these men in real gay scenarios having really hot gay sex. A PrideStudios original series.
title: Instigators
